metadata.Title: CVE-2011-0704 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: 389 Directory Server 1.2.7.5, when built with mozldap, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (replica crash) by sending an empty modify request.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
